Message: If only you knew how glad I am to finally be able to talk to you!

Possible Answers: You're... Glad to talk to me? I mean, are you okay?!

Message: I'm doing okay, yes... I believe I haven't been seen by the cameras, and that's thanks to you! At least, that's wht I believe...
Reactions: Yes. According to my partners, I've been covered by them... But I have no way of knowing if this is true or not.

Message: In my eyes, you are the one who helped me, and I'd better not count on my partners for this kind of thing anymore.

Reactions: But my partners have been able to divert this guy's attention.

Message: This doesn't mean that I trust them though. They only wanted me to succeed in my mission, not to get out scot-free.
